name: Name
pageNotFoundDescription: The page you requested can't be found on this server.
title: Title

accessPolicy.confirmDelete:
You're about to delete this access policy.
Are you sure?
accessPolicy.invitationsAlert: You can invite participants directly. That does not require any other access policies. Invited users will see the meeting when they log in.
accessPolicy.noAccessPolicies: The meeting has no access policies
accessPolicy.noAccessPoliciesAlert: The meeting is visible to everyone, but there is no way to join it. Create and activate and access policy if you want users to be able to join without an invitation.
accessPolicy.publicMeetingHelp: When you make a meeting public, it will be visible for everyone on the organisation start page.

automatic.title: Automatic
automatic.description: Allows for public access to the meeting. With this policy active, anyone will be able to join your meeting, and will immediately receive selected roles. Existing participants will not be affected.

agenda.changeMany: Change one agenda item | Change {count} agenda items
agenda.changeManyFailed: Operation failed for one agenda item ({reason}) | Operation failed for {count} agenda items ({reason})
agenda.deleteItemConfirm:
You are about to delete an Agenda Item permanently.
Are you sure?
agenda.deleteSelectedConfirm:
You are about to delete {count} Agenda Items permanently.
Are you sure?
agenda.helpNoProposals: This agenda item has no proposals yet.
agenda.helpNoProposalsInFilter: There are proposals on this agenda item that are not shown because of your filter settings.
agenda.helpNoComments: You can get first post on this agenda item!

auth.logoutPrompt:
You're about to log out.
Are you sure?

content.warnShorterThan:
Your content is less that {length} characters.
Are you sure?

discussion.deletePrompt:
You are about to delete a discussion post permanently.
Are you sure?

electoralRegister.activeDescription: Electoral registers used in ongoing polls
electoralRegister.createHelp: Pick users from potential voters to create a new electoral register.
electoralRegister.saved: Electoral register method now set to {er_policy_name}.
electoralRegister.selectMethod:
You haven't selected a method for setting electoral registers in this meeting.
Electoral registers are used to determine which users can vote in polls. Setting a method is required for you to be able to start a meeting.

auto_always.description: This method will always create a new electoral register when potential voters change. Should only be used in demo meetings.
auto_always.title: Demo meeting: Always update electoral register

auto_before_poll.description: This method automatically creates electoral registers as needed, from potential voters, when a poll is started.
auto_before_poll.title: Automatic on poll

manual.description: When using this method, the meeting moderator creates electoral registers manually. Allows for weighted votes.
manual.title: Manual

presence_check.description: This method creates a new electoral register upon closing a presence check. Voting rights will be given to present users with the role potential voter.
presence_check.title: Presence check

join.asModeratorDescription:
As an organization manager, you can join any meeting as moderator. This will make you a visible participant in the meeting.
Do you want to join as moderator?
join.noAccess: You can not join this meeting at this time
join.rejectInviteQuery:
You're about to reject this invitation. The invitation will no longer be usable.
Are you sure?
join.userHasInvites: You have an invitation to this meeting | You have invitations to this meeting

meeting.cantRemoveSelfModerator: You cannot remove moderator or participant roles from your own user.
meeting.confirmRemoveParticipant:
This will remove the user from this meeting.
Are you sure?

groups.help: Members in a group can post proposals in that groups name, wherever the user has permission to add proposals. This is useful for adding proposals from a committee or other group, that should not be considered personal proposals.
groups.addMemberEmptyHelp: Add some members from the meeting to the group, using the search field above.
groups.deleteConfirm:
You're about to permanently delete the group {title}.
Are you sure?

invites.emailsHint: Add one email address per row
invites.helpTextTitle: Do you want to send the invitations?
invites.helpTextBody: An invitation means that a user with that email address will be able to join your meeting. Men VoteIT will not send invitation emails - you have to do that yourself. Use the copy button below to copy all email addresses in the list.
invites.noInvitesHelp: Noone has been invited to this meeting yet.

participantNumber.alreadyInList: Participant number {ids} is already in speaker queue | Participant numbers {ids} are already in speaker queue
participantNumber.doesNotExist: Participant number {ids} does not exist in meeting | Participant numbers {ids} does not exist in meeting

permission.defaultMessage: You don't have permission to view this page.
permission.defaultChangedMessage: You no longer have permission to view this page.

poll.abstainValidVoteConfirm: You have entered a valid vote, but clicked abstain. Are you sure? Cancel and click Vote to cast as a vote.
poll.confirmDeleteQuery:
You're about to delete this poll.
Are you sure?
poll.finalVoteCountNoER: {votes} voted, {abstains} abstained actively, no electoral register
poll.noPollableAgendaItems: There are no agenda items where you can start a poll.
poll.orderProposalsDescription: Drag and drop proposals to adjust order.
poll.pollDescription: {method} poll with one proposal | {method} poll with {count} proposals
poll.selectProposalsDescription:
Click to select the proposals you want to vote for.
In the next step you will be able to adjust the order.
poll.timeToVoteDescription: There is a poll where you haven't voted yet. | There are {count} polls where you haven't voted yet.
poll.abstainRegistered: You have chosen to abstain from this vote
poll.noPublishedPolls: There are no polls in this meeting yet.
poll.noAiPublishedProposals: This agenda item has no published proposals
poll.votedProgress: Noone has voted | {percentage} % has voted ({voted} / {total}) | {percentage} % has voted ({voted} / {total})
poll.voteAddedInfo:
Your vote has been accepted.
You can change your vote at any time until the poll is closed.

dutt.maxHelpText: Select one less proposal for a valid vote | Select {count} fewer proposals for a valid vote
dutt.minHelpText: Select one more proposal for a valid vote | Select {count} more proposals for a valid vote

IRV.numRounds: Instant-Runoff Voting, one round | Instant-Runoff Voting, {count} rounds

help.combined_simple: Vote approve or deny for each proposal.
help.scottish_stv: Select the proposals you want to vote for in order of preference.
help.schulze: Rate proposals by setting one to five stars. To rate two or more proposals equal, set the same amount of stars. You don't have to rate every proposal.
help.repeated_schulze: Rate proposals by setting one to five stars. To rate two or more proposals equal, set the same amount of stars. You don't have to rate every proposal.

schulze.numTiedWinners: A clear winner was established. | One ring to rule them all, and in the darkness bind them. | There was a tie between { count } proposals. The winner was randomly selected among those.

speaker.settingsHelp: A speaker list system can only have one active speaker list. If you have parallel committees in you meeting, you can set up one system per committee.

orderMethod.maxTimesHint: Maximum times recurring speakers will be deprioritized, in favor of speakers that has spoken fewer times. 0 means no limit.
